mapper.select: SELECT * FROM AREA WHERE city_no = #{city_no} AND name LIKE #{searchKeyword} ORDER BY no ASC
SELECT * FROM AREA where city_no = #{city_no} ORDER BY no ASC
SELECT * FROM AREA JOIN AREA_IMG on AREA_IMG.NO = AREA.NO WHERE city_no = #{city_no} AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM SCH_DETAIL WHERE SCH_DETAIL.AREA_NO = AREA.NO AND NO = #{no} AND SCH_NO = ${sch_no})
SELECT * FROM AREA INNER JOIN AREA_IMG USING(NO) WHERE CITY_NO = #{city_no}
SELECT * FROM AREA WHERE CITY_NO = #{city_no} ORDER BY NAME
SELECT * FROM AREA INNER JOIN AREA_IMG USING(NO) WHERE CITY_NO = #{city_no} AND (NAME LIKE #{searchKeyword} OR CONTENT LIKE #{searchKeyword}) ORDER BY NAME
SELECT * FROM AREA INNER JOIN AREA_IMG USING(NO) WHERE LIKE1 = #{like1} ORDER BY LIKE1 DESC
SELECT * FROM AREA_IMG WHERE no = (select max(no) from AREA_IMG) and CITY_NO = #{city_no}
SELECT * FROM AREA_REV WHERE NO = #{no} ORDER BY WRITEDATE DESC
SELECT ORG_NAME FROM AREA_IMG WHERE NO = #{no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO AREA(NO, NAME, CONTENT, ADDRESS, WAY, TEL, HOURS, WEB, CITY_NO) VALUES(AREA_NO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{name}, #{content}, #{address}, #{way}, #{tel}, #{hours}, #{web}, #{city_no})
mapper.select: select * from area where no = (select max(no) from area)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO AREA_IMG(NO, ORG_NAME, SAV_NAME, AREA_NO,CITY_NO) VALUES(AREA_IMG_NO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{org_name}, #{sav_name}, #{area_no}, #{city_no})
INSERT INTO AREA_REV(NO, EMAIL, AREA_NO, CONTENT, WRITEDATE) VALUES(AREA_REV_NO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{email}, #{area_no}, #{content}, sysdate)
